# External Skills Manifest

## Vercel React Best Practices

- Source: `https://skills.sh/vercel-labs/agent-skills/vercel-react-best-practices`
- Install: `npx skills add vercel-labs/agent-skills@vercel-react-best-practices`

## React Native Best Practices

- Source: `https://skills.sh`
- Discover/Install: `npx skills find "react native performance"`

## Implement Design

- Source: `https://skills.sh`
- Discover/Install: `npx skills find "figma implement design"`
